definition: abbr. for 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1]/surname Yang
to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate

Mikoyan (name)/Anastas Ivanonovich Mikoyan (1895-1978), Soviet politician, politburo member in the 1950s and 1960s/Artem Ivanovich Mikoyan (1905-1970), brother of the politician and one designer of MiG military aircraft

sentences.english: The Olympic oriflamme is soaring out on the Divine Lands, they're flags of peace and soundness in the Loyal Counties.
sentences.chinese: 神州高扬奥林匹克之旗，赤县飘飞和平永固之帜。

sentences.english: Zhang Chengzhi always spreads moral idealism in his novels.
sentences.chinese: 张承志始终高扬着道德理想主义的大旗。

sentences.english: The paper thinks there mainly have the following several characteristics: (1) Raising the banner of the revolutionary heroism highly.
sentences.chinese: 高扬革命英雄主义的旗帜。

sentences.english: Keep your head up, your shoulders back and your legs against the horse.
sentences.chinese: 头部高扬，肩膀后展，双腿紧贴马身。

sentences.english: Speaking highly of the scientific spirit was just his intention in the polemic between Science and Metaphysics.
sentences.chinese: 科玄论战中他对科学精神的极度高扬即用意在此。

definition: to raise one's head/to perk up
high-pitched and penetrating (musical instrument, voice etc)/high-spirited/fever-pitched (atmosphere)
head high/in high spirits/to raise one's head (e.g. of neighing horse)
to rouse/to invigorate/to enliven/to put sb into high spirits/con brio
to sprout up/to flourish/(of war etc) to break out/rapid growth
